goal.en: “1. Provide research guidance2. Equip students with lab skills of each research discipline3. The training of thesis writing and presentation abilities4. Advise students to complete Ph.D. thesis 5. The ability to coordinate and execute research projects“
goal.ch: “1. 指導研究生從事論文相關之研究2. 訓練學生具備各專業領域之研究方法3. 訓練論文寫作與發表的能力4. 指導研究生撰寫博士論文5. 指導研究生統籌與執行研究計畫的能力“

content.en: “1. One-on-one discussions2. Participating in research group meetings3. Publish conference or journal papers4. Ph.D. thesis dissertation“
content.ch: “1. 一對一方式研討2. 組內口頭報告3. 發表研討會或期刊論文4. 博士論文口試“

textbook.en: “1. Key journals in each research discipline2. MS or Ph.D. thesis of each research group“
textbook.ch: “1. 各專業領域重要期刊2. 實驗室先期碩博士論文“

method.en: Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: Evaluation is based on individual’s research progress and achievements
grading.ch: 依實驗進度與成果而定

en.competency: Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.

en.competency: Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
